nodes.text: Creepmice were a species that could be found living within the Jedi Archives of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. In 87 BBY, Jedi Initiates Sifo-Dyas and Dooku planned to break into the Bogan Collection, a hidden vault within the Archives. The pair entered the library late at night, as to not be caught by Chief Librarian Restelly Quist or other Jedi. Dooku was nervous about being spotted, but Sifo-Dyas assured him that only creepmice were present in the Archives at such a late time.
Creepmice were mentioned in a flashback in Dooku: Jedi Lost, a 2019 audio drama written by Cavan Scott.
